level.heading: Short title.
level.text: This chapter may be cited as the "Business Corporation Act of 2010".

level.heading: Cross References
level.text: Cooperative associations, applicability of this chapter, see § 29-938.
Reciprocal insurance company conversions, applicability of this chapter, see § 31-754.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.
